name: solarized-dark-syntax
description: A dark syntax theme using the solarized colors
readme: # Solarized Dark Syntax theme Atom theme using the ever popular dark [solarized](http://ethanschoonover.com/solarized) colors. This theme is installed by default with Atom and can be activated by going to the _Themes_ section in the Settings view (`cmd-,`) and selecting it from the _Syntax Themes_ dropdown menu.
